thread.title: Blue Bamboo Releases Over-the-air (OTA) on PocketPOS P200 POS Terminal
thread.title_full: Blue Bamboo Releases Over-the-air (OTA) on PocketPOS P200 POS Terminal

author: prbuzz.com
title: Blue Bamboo Releases Over-the-air (OTA) on PocketPOS P200 POS Terminal
text:
Shanghai, China (PRBuzz.com) Aug 26th, 2015 -- Blue Bamboo, an innovative electronic payment solution provider, today releases a major update to its OTA (over-the-air) platform for PocketPOS P200 POS Terminal . With P200 OTA platform, users can remotely update software, change settings or inject encryption keys.
P200 OTA is a cloud database that offers parameters and applications, for those merchants who use P200 to add, delete and revise. Payment service providers and mobile merchants can customize applications based on their needs and demands.
P200 OTA presents a user-friendly interface and provides an Application Programming Interface (API) allowing for seamless integrations. Merchant service providers do not need to go to each merchant's store to upgrade applications. P200 OTA uses end-to-end encryption (E2EE) keys. Blue Bamboo's customers will find it easy and safe to use, which has always been the dedication of Blue Bamboo.
Blue Bamboo's P200 POS Terminal has three options: Bluetooth, GPRS or Wifi. Compliant with EMV and PCI requirements, the P200 is an ideal device for EMV adoption in the United States and other countries. Contact Blue Bamboo Support Team to request P200 OTA demo at This email address is being protected from spambots. About Blue Bamboo
Blue Bamboo designs and markets feature-rich and exceptionally affordable POS terminal products enabling mobile payment acceptance anywhere, anytime. Blue Bamboo's robust electronic payment technology delivers scalable, customer-centric wireless and retail payment solutions that meet PCI and EMV standards in a secure, reliable and versatile design. Visit www.bluebamboo.com .
